title: Payload Breakdown
extract: Payload is the carrying capacity of an aircraft or launch vehicle, usually measured in terms of weight. ... The fraction of payload to the total liftoff weight of the air or spacecraft is known as the "payload fraction".
extract_html: Payload is the carrying capacity of an aircraft or launch vehicle, usually measured in terms of weight. ... The fraction of payload to the total liftoff weight of the air or spacecraft is known as the "payload fraction".
